content.text:
# 1952 Holy Cross Crusaders football team

The 1952 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an American football team that represented the College of the Holy Cross as an independent during the 1952 college football season.  In its ninth year under head coach Eddie Anderson, the team compiled an 8â€“2 record. The team played its home games at Fitton Field in Worcester, Massachusetts.
